abilities.description: (PASSIVE)INHERENT GLAMOURNeeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
abilities.name: INHERENT GLAMOURN

abilities.description: (Q)BLOOMING BURSTNeeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
abilities.name: BLOOMING BURSTN

abilities.description: (W)SHAPESPLITTERNeeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
abilities.name: SHAPESPLITTERN

abilities.description: (E)TANGLE-BARBSNeeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
abilities.name: TANGLE

abilities.description: (R)POP BLOSSOMAfter a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
abilities.name: POP BLOSSOMA
